properties.entry: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( SD_NO , SD_TITLE , SD_PLACE , SD_SDATE , SD_EDATE , SD_DESCRIPTION , RANGE_NO , BGI_NO , SD_CDATE , SD_STATUS , M_NO , SD_HOWLONG ) VALUES ( SEQ_SD.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'N' , ? , ? )

SELECT SD_NO , SD_TITLE , SD_PLACE , SD_SDATE , SD_EDATE , SD_DESCRIPTION , RANGE_NO , BGI_NO , SD_CDATE , SD_STATUS , M_NO , SD_HOWLONG , BBGI_PATH , UBGI_PATH FROM SCHEDULE LEFT OUTER JOIN BASIC_BGI ON (BBGI_NO = BGI_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_BGI ON (UBGI_NO = BGI_NO) WHERE M_NO = ?
SELECT SD_SDATE , SD_EDATE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE M_NO = ? AND SD_NO = ?
